biotools.summary: Database-driven, web-based tool designed to help researchers compile, store, export, and share sets of genes. This application supports the 17 eukaryotic genomes found in version 32 of the Ensembl database, which includes species from yeast to human. User-created information such as sets and customized annotations are stored and can be shared to facilitate easy access.

bioschemas.name: Gene Set Builder
